title: i'd give up forever - giuliana - Phandom/The Fantastic Foursome (YouTube RPF) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
hello! i have written this little one shot a few days ago and i would love it if you read it :), i’m pretty new at this writing thing but i try to do my best, i really really really hope you like it

summary: 

Dan and Phil were both struggling with their own demons, and their relationship was falling apart. They were going through the worst time of their lives, and things between them ending seemed like the only possible way out… wasn’t it?

summary: Sometimes I wish I could see Dan and Phil’s other old dailybooth and twitter posts to be able to see the bigger picture. The...
question: Sometimes I wish I could see Dan and Phil’s other old dailybooth and twitter posts to be able to see the bigger picture. The ones that are preserved definitely make it seem like phan is/was real, but according to some they also flirted with other people, if those updates were available too it would definitely give a different perspective to the posts we know about. 1/2
answer:
“When I first got into phandom I was definitely convinced that they are a couple, but the longer I spend here the more I realize how one-sided everyone’s view of them is and how only the things that fit what people want to believe are preserved and added to the narrative. 2/2”

…

You’re completely right. It’s so easy to look back at the Phan archive or whatever and think “holy fuck how could anyone think they aren’t/weren’t together?” Because all of the screenshots we have seen to suggest that. But that’s because people only bother to archive the things that further their own agenda.

And I’m not sure if that’s different now. Right now we’ve got blogs that are entirely dedicated to screenshotting every tweet, every twitter like, every reply, everything Dan and Phil do. But a lot of the screenshots we have from the earlier days were screenshotted simply because they could be used as “proof”. And anything that didn’t fit that narrative got lost to time.

And I’m not sure if that’s different now. Right now we’ve got blogs that are entirely dedicated to screenshotting every tweet, every twitter like, every reply, everything Dan and Phil do.  re-uploaded for @doineedtohaveawordwithyou because...
body:
The Isle of Man

Ao3 link: *.*

Summary:  He’s just very thankful tonight.

re-uploaded for @doineedtohaveawordwithyou because this fic led to us being friends and i will never not be happy about that. Katie we don’t talk as much as before but whatever you do know that i will always love you so very much.
